Are you looking for a solid host? Look no further. Come home to UnderHost, and stop travelling from host to host.

For 12 years now, UnderHost has been providing quality offshore hosting based on a simple success formula, customer service, server uptime, and integrity.

Customer Service
We offer a genuine 24/7, 365-day Help Desk Availability.
We use several strategies to keep our Help Desk online where other hosts do not. Employing redundant Internet connections is just one way that UnderHost, ensures the availability of our staff to you at all times.

Our support staff use English as a first language and possesses graduate-level communication skills, and French service is also available for European customers.

Server Uptime
UnderHost offers a 99.9% uptime guarantee.
That means your Web site is guaranteed operational 99.9% of the time in any calendar month.

Integrity
UnderHost offers 14-day Money Back Guarantee.
UnderHost will refund your money within the first 14-days of signing up, no questions asked.

CloudLinux™ - nginx™
UnderHost uses the latest virtualization technologies from CloudLinux to improve server stability and prevent downtime on our shared hosting servers.

A typical shared server hosts vast numbers of accounts that all use the same server resources. If one website uses too many resources, it can slow down or shut down the server. This is common for shared hosting servers and happens for like:

  • Traffic spikes – a mention on a popular forum can send thousands of visitors to a website in minutes and overwhelm the server, causing downtime.
  • Inefficient coding – a single bug in one website’s code can use all CPU resources, no matter how powerful the server, and cause downtime.
  • Denial Of Service attacks – hackers invade an insecure website and hog the server resources.

We eliminate these threats by using CloudLinux and Nginx, an operating system specifically designed to address shared resources' weaknesses and risks. CloudLinux uses innovative Lightweight Virtualization Environment (LVE) technology to create isolation between websites on a shared server. CloudLinux prevents each one from using more resources than allocated by containing each site, making sure that one website cannot affect another.

CloudLinux gives you peace of mind that your website is protected from other sites on the same server. At the same time, nginx™ (pronounced “engine x”) is known for its high performance, stability, rich feature set, simple configuration, and low resource consumption.

Let's Encrypt
All our shared servers also offer FREE SSL/TLS from Let's Encrypt. Let’s Encrypt is a free, automated, and open certificate authority (CA) run for the public’s benefit.

Upgrade/Downgrade Anytime
Upgrade/Downgrade anytime day or night.
Log into our billing system, choose the upgrade/downgrade you wish and if you upgrade, pay the invoice and your package will be upgraded.

To use Softaculous, you or your client will just login to the control panel, click Softaculous, and then select one of the 350+ scripts to be installed, such as... Blogs, Portals/CMS, Forums, shopping carts, Image Galleries, Mailing Lists.
